body:
Would love to get this working but I keep getting the following super ambiguous error

[repos]$ spack install fenics @2016.2.0
==> Error: 'doc'
[repos]$ spack install fenics @2016.1.0
==> Error: 'doc'
[repos]$ spack install fenics @2017.1.0
==> Error: 'doc'
[repos]$ spack install fenics @1.6.0
==> Error: 'doc'
[repos]$ spack install fenics
==> Error: 'doc'
title: fenics doesn't install on Ubuntu 16
